casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
S.C. (PEOPLE) S245314 Supreme Court of California DECEMBER 13, 2017 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in Avitia v. Superior Court, S242030 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, *161pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
